summary: a small starter home in the town of Riverwood next to the lumber mill.
descriptionHtml:
update: 

A new version is now available. This replaces the existing interior with one that has a basement and better lighting. Make sure if you are updating from the old file to empty the containers in the house and make a new save outside the house before installing the new file. Let me know what you think in the comments section 




Description: 

This adds a small player home next to the lumber mill in Riverwood. It is a small one room shack that i made for my character as a base of operations at the beginning of the game. All storage containers are safe and do not respawn. To install just copy the esp into your data file and check it under data files when you start the game. enjoy.
author: Leemcky

files.name: Riverhouse New interior with basement
files.changelogHtml: The existing interior has been changed to a new one with a basement and better lighting. make sure if you are updating from the old file to take everything out of the containers and save outside the house before downloading and installing the new one.
